\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 2655}

\subsection*{Frequent Flyer}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{ELM}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   & oral & GHB & liquid\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 115.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}

On my plane ride to Acapulco for spring break on the airplane I decided to take a couple caps of G since there was no alcohol being served on the plane because it was all young college kids. i took more than i usually do and ended up vomiting all over the place and passing out for a couple of hours without remembering anything. when i regained conciousness all my friends around me showed me the video tape they had recorded while i was passed out.the flight attendants had cleaned me up with the help of my friends and then made someone hold an oxygen mask attached to a small tank over my nose and mouth the entire time i was unconcious. i didn't remember any of it and i had an awful hangover all that night and the next morning.

\end{document}
